title: The Ghost train
creator_credit: Gainsborough Pictures, Gaumont, Edward Black and Walter Forde
brief_description: Tales of ghosts and things that go bump in the night feature in this British comedy thriller about a phantom train and a group of travellers stranded overnight in the waiting room of a small Cornish junction station. Stars Arthur Askey along with Richard Murdoch, Kathleen Harrison, Peter Murray-Hill, Carole Lynne and Morland Graham. Based on the play by Arnold Ridley.
